mapper.sql: id, data_element_id, data_element_name, vocabulary, create_date, create_user_id, modify_date, modify_user_id
mapper.insert:
insert into data_element_vocabulary (id, data_element_id, data_element_name, vocabulary, create_date, create_user_id, modify_date, modify_user_id) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dataElementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dataElementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vocabulary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete:
delete from data_element_vocabulary where id in
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT dev.vocabulary ,-- 词汇名称 v.definition -- 定义 FROM `data_element_vocabulary` dev LEFT JOIN vocabulary v on dev.vocabulary = v.vocabulary where data_element_id = #{dataElementId}

SELECT vr.subject_vocabulary as subjectVocabulary,-- 主位词 vr.object_vocabulary as objectVocabulary,-- 宾位词 vr.relationship,-- 关系 v.definition -- 定义 FROM `vocabulary_rel` vr LEFT JOIN vocabulary v ON vr.object_vocabulary = v.vocabulary WHERE vr.subject_vocabulary in
#{item}
